contentrichtext.text: {{Expand French|topic=geo|date=December 2008|Varambon}} {{Infobox French commune |name = Varambon |region = Rhône-Alpes |department = Ain |arrondissement = Bourg-en-Bresse |canton = Pont-d'Ain |INSEE = 01000 |postal code = 01300 |mayor = André Bernard |term = 2008–2014 |intercommunality = |longitude = 5.3167 |latitude = 46.0333 |elevation m = |elevation min m = 228 |elevation max m = 347 |area km2 = 7.99 |population = 536 |population date = 2008 }} '''Varambon''' is a [[Communes of France|commune]] in the [[Ain]] [[Departments of France|department]] in eastern [[France]]. ==Population== {{Historical populations |align=left | 1793|511 | 1800|454 | 1806|484 | 1821|473 | 1831|441 | 1836|460 | 1841|461 | 1846|412 | 1851|425 | 1856|424 | 1861|385 | 1866|385 | 1872|414 | 1876|419 | 1881|427 | 1886|461 | 1891|386 | 1896|418 | 1901|384 | 1906|378 | 1911|342 | 1921|353 | 1926|340 | 1931|312 | 1936|302 | 1946|334 | 1954|264 | 1962|265 | 1968|299 | 1975|287 | 1982|314 | 1990|353 | 1999|385 | 2008|536 }} {{clear-left}} ==See also== *[[Communes of the Ain department]] ==References== *[http://www.insee.fr/en/home/home_page.asp INSEE] {{reflist}} {{Ain communes}} [[Category:Communes of Ain]] {{Ain-geo-stub}}
